extendedInfo.description: SATV Channel is an Android app that allows you to watch the latest episodes of youtube's  topmost subscribed channels from South Africa.Channels included are 15 Topmost tubers in field of  TV shows,sports,news,comedy and funny miscellaneous videos.   This app requires the Youtube app to play videos in HD and Fullscreen.If you don't have the youtube app installed, when you try to play a movie you would be automatically redirected to the google playstore to install.After the Youtube app has been installed you can   watch the topmost South Africa youtube Channels
